910700.name: Space Break
910700.description:
Build ships from elements and go to fight.

The player can control several different spaceships at the same time (fleet battles).
During the battle you can switch ships and different ships can attack different opponents.


Features:
  • 384 elements with different looks
  • a ship can consist of maximum 400 items
  • 9 buildable ships

- functional elements:
  • engines
  • cannons
  • lasers
  • rocket launchers
  • interceptor missile
  • (the other elements are decorative elements)

- energy-using systems:
  • engines
  • shields
  • weapons

Choose your ships and tactics for each battle.
